education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering
Master of Science in Artificial Intelligence (In Progress)

technicalSkills: Data Manipulation, Generative AI, Multi-Agent Systems, Transformers (Hugging Face), LangChain, Retrieval-Augmented Generation, LLM Orchestration, Python, FAISS

projects.title: AI-Powered Call Center Evaluation System
projects.description: Built a full-stack AI system to analyze call center audio by transcribing calls, tracking speakers and detecting emotions.

projects.title: YouTube Transcript QA Chatbot
projects.description: Developed a chatbot to answer questions from YouTube transcripts using LangChain, FAISS, and OpenAI’s language models.

projects.title: Air Quality Forecasting with LSTM & GRU
projects.description: Built LSTM and GRU models from scratch using NumPy to forecast PM2.5 levels, then re-implemented them using PyTorch’s RNN modules for performance comparison.

certificationsOrTools: LangChain, Hugging Face Transformers, AssemblyAI, Groq
personalSummary: AI learner with a practical mindset, focused on solving real business problems through simple and effective solutions. With a strong understanding of Machine Learning (ML), Deep Learning (DL) and Natural Language Processing (NLP) concepts.
